value:
The Book of Naga...has always
seemed both familiar...and
mysterious.

My mother and father...and my
brother Julius... They were all as
kind as you can imagine.

As always, thank you for all that
you do. Let me know if there's
anything more I can do to help.

Seliph...that is, my brother...is the
sort of person who could lead a
world toward peace.$k$pAs are you, clearly.

My brother Julius, once very kind,
turned into a twisted devil...$k$pThen by that devil's hands, my
mother...and my father... Oh, it's
beyond anything!

Ah. Sorry to be a bother, but
I've found myself here and...
Where am I exactly?

I will fight—no matter who our
foe!

I want to grow stronger so I
can give my all.

I won't take flight, no matter
how dire things may get.

I grow closer to understanding
the reason I am here.

My name is Julia—she who inherited
the ability to use the book of the
Divine Dragon, Naga.

My brother Julius and I both inherited
a special power through our lineage.$k$pI...gained the ability to use the
Book of Naga.$k$pMy brother...could take hold of a
book of terrible darkness, and it turned
him into a devil of a man.$k$pBoth of our fates were made merely
because of lineage.$k$pWhat if I could succumb to what took
hold of my brother—become your
worst enemy against my will?$k$pThe thought terrifies me. But I take
heart in one thing—how you have
continued to be there for me.$k$pI believe, were that to happen, that
one word from you would bring
me back to my senses.$k$pI ask you to never leave my side, so
that I...can never leave yours.
はっ…
えい…
きゃああっ！
Away with you!
May the gods protect me.
I...I remember!
I'll fight... I will!
Ohhh...
Hehe
May you never be hurt.
May the gods ever protect you.
Oh! I see. It's you, isn't it?
To be bathed in such warm light!
Wh-what? Have I done...? What?
Mother... You always watch over me.
I want to help you too...
All right.
What?
Of course.
